description: Refresh existing content using skyscraper technique to improve rankings

files.reason: Identifies underperforming content that needs refresh based on traffic and ranking data
Shows what competitors are doing better and identifies content improvement opportunities

data.impact: Without performance data, cannot identify which content needs refresh or measure improvement
Without competitor analysis, refresh may not address competitive gaps and miss ranking opportunities

commands.name: audit-content-performance
commands.reason: Analyzes current content performance to identify underperforming pages
commands.exampleOutput: Analyzed 47 pages, found 12 underperforming (>30 day traffic decline)
commands.nextSteps: Review underperforming content and prioritize for refresh

commands.name: competitor-analysis
commands.reason: Identifies what competitors are doing better to inform content improvements
commands.exampleOutput: Analyzed 5 competitors, identified 23 content gaps and opportunities
commands.nextSteps: Identify specific improvements to make content more competitive
